synonyms.synonym: Paired basic amino acid residue-cleaving enzyme

protein.specific_function: Furin is likely to represent the ubiquitous endoprotease activity within constitutive secretory pathways and capable of cleavage at the RX(K/R)R consensus motif

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides

reference.reference_text: van den Ouweland AM, van Duijnhoven HL, Keizer GD, Dorssers LC, Van de Ven WJ: Structural homology between the human fur gene product and the subtilisin-like protease encoded by yeast KEX2. Nucleic Acids Res. 1990 Feb 11;18(3):664.
